# dismissPopover(_:)

**Instance Method**

Dismisses the popover.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func dismissPopover(_ completion: (() -> Void)? = nil)
```

```swift
@MainActor func dismissPopover() async
```

## Parameters

- **completion**: The system calls this handler after the system finishes dismissing the popover.
title: dismissPopover(_:)
